item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, May 8, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Void: Open-source Cursor alternative (31 points | 6 comments)
2. Progress toward fusion energy gain as measured against the Lawson criteria (36 points | 1 comment)
3. Show HN: Using eBPF to see through encryption without a proxy (24 points | 4 comments)
4. Using NASA’s SMAP satellite to detect L-band interference (263 points | 53 comments)
5. Habemus Papam - new pope elected on second day of the conclave (55 points | 13 comments)
6. Ciro (YC S22) is hiring a software engineer to build AI agents for sales ( | hide)
7. Using Coalton to implement a quantum compiler (2022) (24 points | 2 comments)
8. More people are getting their tattoos removed (18 points | 7 comments)
9. High tariffs become 'real' with our first $36K bill (202 points | 118 comments)
10. Reservoir Sampling (4 points | discuss)
11. Ask HN: What are good high-information density UIs (screenshots, apps, sites)? (208 points | 166 comments)
12. Notes on rolling out Cursor and Claude Code (7 points | discuss)
13. Google to back three new nuclear projects (182 points | 191 comments)
14. My new deadline: 20 years to give away virtually all my wealth (296 points | 333 comments)
15. How to harden GitHub Actions (151 points | 42 comments)
16. Mycoria is an open and secure overlay network that connects all participants (283 points | 108 comments)
17. How Obama’s BlackBerry got secured (2013) (137 points | 48 comments)
18. How linear regression works intuitively and how it leads to gradient descent (280 points | 83 comments)
19. Show HN: Checking Pope's election results with smoke test script for chimney (5 points | 3 comments)
20. Microservices are a tax your startup probably can't afford (185 points | 143 comments)
21. AI focused on brain regions recreates what you're looking at (2024) (11 points | 7 comments)
22. Will protein design tools solve the snake antivenom shortage? (37 points | 13 comments)
23. Hypermode Model Router Preview – OpenRouter Alternative (11 points | 2 comments)
24. Ty: A fast Python type checker and language server (834 points | 267 comments)
25. Imagineers defend new Walt Disney robot (33 points | 24 comments)
26. Mass spectrometry method identifies pathogens within minutes instead of days (108 points | 33 comments)
27. Huawei unveils laptop running self-developed HarmonyOS as Windows licence expire (57 points | 31 comments)
28. Inheritance was invented as a performance hack (2021) (173 points | 182 comments)
29. Waiting for Postgres 18: Accelerating Disk Reads with Asynchronous I/O (528 points | 139 comments)
30. Heat stress mitigation by trees and shelters at bus stops (113 points | 95 comments)
